channel.title: The Spodcast
channel.itunes:author: Josh, Chris, Rutskan, and Mumbles?
channel.itunes:subtitle: Like Spoiler Warning, but with less video.

item.title: The Spodcast #3: Far Cry 5, Movie Madness, and Anime Tiddies
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
Alex of http://firstpersonscholar.com joins us to talk about films, food, Far Cry, and... anime tiddies?


4:30 Far Cry 5

19:40 Lord of the Rings Animated Films

27:35 Guardians of the Galaxy 2

35:40 Logan (Spoilers)

46:35 John Wick 2

48:00 Colossal

51:05 Mailbag

52:25 What are some of your favorite food and drink pairings?

1:00:00 How do you feel about the Starcraft remaster?

1:07:50 Glitch talks about Majesty 2

1:11:40 How do you feel about Steam Direct and its paywall?


Featuring: "Off to Osaka" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

item.title: The Spodcast #2: Destiny 2, Prey, and Typhoid Burgers
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
Wherein the episode goes up three hours late, we still don't have a website yet, but Glitch gets Pop-Tarts.


4:25 - Destiny 2 Reveal

17:05 - Square Enix parting ways with IO Interactive

25:20 - Prey

42:05 - Prey Story Spoilers

1:08:25 - Mailbag

1:08:35 - Chris, how is Pepsi Fire?

1:11:55 - Rank Fast Food Burgers from Worst to Best

1:24:45 - When do you think EA will shut down BioWare Montreal?

1:32:20 - Alan Wake and Expired Music Licenses

1:38:55 - What is your favorite recipe that uses alcohol as an ingredient?

1:44:00 - Glitch's wife made homemade Pop-Tarts and we're (mostly) all jealous. 


Featuring: "Off to Osaka" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

item.title: The Spoiler Warning Podcast #1
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
It seems only appropriate for us to try one of these things.

This was a little later than intended, but migraines be damned, it's going up tonight!

2:30 - Spoiler Warning is leaving Twenty Sided. 

I didn't want to get too far into this on the podcast, but if you want to know more about the circumstances that led to the split, I wrote about it on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/posts/well-that-9299827

6:30 - Sleeping Dogs is getting a movie?

18:15 - Would Quantic Dream games be better or worse as films?

22:45 - E3 and bad trailers

31:05 - Prey

46:55 - PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS


Featuring: "Off to Osaka" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
